<<<<<<< HEAD
Certain sermons or homilies appointed to be read in churches in the time of Queen Elizabeth of famous memory and now reprinted for the use of private families, in two parts.
[12], 646 p.
Printed for George Wells ... Abel Swall ... and George Pawlett ..., London : 1687.
"The second part of the homilies" has special t.p. "A table of the sermons ..." p. [10]-[11] "The table of the homilies ensuing" p. 157-158. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
